hero.label: Support
hero.title: Help Center
hero.subtitle: Quick answers and guides for common questions.

gettingStarted.title: Getting started
gettingStarted.subtitle: Learn the basics of browsing, unlocking, and watching.

steps.1: Browse movies and series in Browse, Movies, or Series.
steps.2: Open a title to view details, trailer, and purchase options.
steps.3: Unlock a movie, season, or episode using your preferred payment method.
steps.4: Start watching instantly from your library or the title page.

gettingStarted.tutorialSubtitle: Watch a short walkthrough of the app experience.
gettingStarted.tutorialMissing: The tutorial video is not configured yet. <0>Check back soon.</0>

accountSecurity.title: Account & security
accountSecurity.subtitle: Tips to keep your account safe and recover access.

passwords.title: Use strong passwords
passwords.body: Choose a password you don’t reuse elsewhere and keep it private.

google.title: Google sign-in
google.body: If you signed up with Google, use the same Google account to log in.

cantSignIn.title: Can’t sign in?
cantSignIn.body: Try resetting your password or reach out to support if you’re stuck.

billing.title: Billing & purchases
billing.subtitle: Help with payments, unlocks, and receipts.

bullets.1: Purchases unlock access to specific titles, seasons, or episodes.
bullets.2: If your payment succeeded but access didn’t update, wait a moment and refresh.
bullets.3: Keep your payment reference if you need support assistance.

buffering.title: Buffering
buffering.body: Try a faster connection, reduce other network usage, or restart the app.

audio.title: Audio out of sync
audio.body: Pause and resume, or restart playback to re-sync audio.

devices.title: Devices
devices.subtitle: Watch on supported devices and keep things updated.

mobile.title: Mobile support
mobile.body: Keep your app updated for the best performance and latest fixes.

stuck.title: App stuck or crashing
stuck.body: Try restarting the app or your device. If it continues, <0>contact support</0>.

callout.title: Need more help?
callout.body: If you can’t find an answer, our support team can help.

hero.label: Support
hero.title: Frequently asked questions
hero.subtitle: Answers to common questions about accounts, playback, and billing.

section.title: Browse answers
section.subtitle: Choose a topic to see quick answers.

account.title: Account
account.description: Login, PIN, password, and access questions.

methods.a: Use your phone number or your Google account if you signed up with Google.

googlePassword.q: I used Google sign-in. Do I have a password?
googlePassword.a: If you registered with Google, you typically log in with Google rather than a separate password.

forgot.q: I forgot my PIN or password. What should I do?
forgot.a: Reach out via <0>Contact</0> and we’ll help you recover access.

buffering.a: Buffering is usually network-related. Try a stronger connection or reduce other downloads.

audio.a: Pause and resume, or restart playback to re-sync.

downloads.q: Can I download videos for offline viewing?
downloads.a: Offline downloads may not be available for all titles or devices.

paymentMethods.q: What payment methods do you support?
paymentMethods.a: Available payment methods depend on your region and the payment provider.

notUnlocked.q: I paid but the content is still locked.
notUnlocked.a: Wait a moment and refresh. If it’s still locked, <0>contact us</0> with your payment reference.

refunds.a: Refund requests are reviewed case-by-case where allowed by law. See <0>Terms</0> for details.

callout.title: Still need help?
callout.body: If your question isn’t listed, our team can assist.

hero.label: Support
hero.title: Contact us
hero.subtitle: Get help with billing, access, playback, or account issues.

direct.title: Reach us directly
direct.subtitle: Use any of the available channels below.
direct.notConfigured: Support contact details are not configured yet.

include.label: Include
include.value: Your phone number and payment reference (if applicable)

form.title: Send a message
form.subtitle: We’ll open your email app with a pre-filled draft.

validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters

hero.label: Legal
hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.subtitle: These terms govern your access to and use of the service. Last updated: {{date}}.

overview.title: Overview
overview.subtitle: By using the service, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the service.
overview.body: These Terms apply to all visitors and users. Additional rules may apply to specific features (for example, purchases/unlocks or promotional offers).

accounts.title: Registration and security
accounts.subtitle: Keep your credentials secure and accurate.

bullets.1: You are responsible for activity that occurs under your account.
bullets.2: Provide accurate account information and keep it up to date.
bullets.3: Do not share your credentials or attempt to access accounts you do not own.

payments.title: Billing, purchases, and refunds
payments.subtitle: How payments work and how to request help.
payments.body1: When you purchase or unlock content, you authorize us (and our payment providers) to charge the selected payment method.
payments.body2: Refund requests are reviewed case-by-case where allowed by applicable law. For purchase issues, contact us via <0>Contact</0> and include the payment reference.

bullets.1: Content availability can vary by region, licensing terms, and time period.
bullets.2: Streaming is for personal, non-commercial use unless explicitly authorized in writing.
bullets.3: We may update, remove, or replace titles and features to improve the service.

acceptableUse.title: What you may not do
acceptableUse.subtitle: Rules that protect our members, partners, and infrastructure.

bullets.1: Do not reverse engineer, scrape, exploit, or interfere with the service.
bullets.2: Do not share, redistribute, or publicly screen content without permission.
bullets.3: Do not use the service for unlawful, harmful, or abusive activity.

disclaimers.title: Service “as is”
disclaimers.subtitle: We work hard to keep the service stable, but outages can happen.
disclaimers.body: The service is provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

changes.title: Updates to these terms
changes.subtitle: We may update these Terms to reflect product or legal changes.
changes.body1: If we make material changes, we’ll provide notice in the app or by other reasonable means. Continued use of the service after updates means you accept the revised Terms.
